TopicTitle: Is there a mod that changes the aero forces overlay?

Articles.Content:
I've always hated the way drag is shown in stock KSP. I have no idea which parts are causing the most drag, and by how much. All i get are a bunch of long red lines overlapping each other so they are impossible to distinguish from one another.

Is there a mod that changes the way drag is shown in the aero forces overlay view? I'm looking for something stock compatible that's not going to actually change drag, but just show it easier.

Thanks in advance!
Try FAR... But I'm not sure if that's what you are looking for...

Have you tried Alt-F12 -> Physics -> Aero -> "Display Aero Data in Action Menus"? There's a ton of detailed info there in stock.  Also the AeroGUI in the same menu, which aggregates aero data over the whole craft
